definition.name: configure-oidc-aws-credentials
definition.description: Fetch temporary AWS session credentials using OIDC
definition.author: dflook

inputs.name: role-arn
inputs.description: ARN of the role to assume

inputs.name: sts-region
inputs.description: The region to use the STS regional endpoint in. If not set, will use the global endpoint.

inputs.name: audience
inputs.description: The OIDC audience to use. The default is set by the GitHub OIDC provider if not set here.

inputs.name: role-session-name
inputs.description: A name to give the role session

inputs.name: export-variables
inputs.description: Set to true to export AWS environment variables

outputs.name: aws-access-key-id
outputs.description: The access key id for the temporary credentials

outputs.name: aws-secret-access-key
outputs.description: The secret access key for the temporary credentials

outputs.name: aws-session-token
outputs.description: The session token for the temporary credentials

outputs.name: expiration
outputs.description: The date on which the credentials expire
